short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and share articles, podcasts, videos, or anything else you find on the web with friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discovr allows you to save and share interesting articles, videos, podcasts, recipes, and more. Simply launch the extension on a webpage that you would like to save and then press share to share the page with friends.
